content.text:
# Billboard Music Award for Top Touring Artist

This article lists the winners and nominees for the 'Billboard Music Award for Top Touring Artist. This award has been given out since 2011 and currently U2 hold the record for most wins in this category with three. The award is not given since 2021 because the touring business is disrupted by the COVID-19 pandemic.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted in bold.
